CustomField.description: S3-Files moved in S3-Link Recycle Bin will be available for recovery for these many days. After these many days S3-Files will be auto deleted from Salesforce and Amazon S3 unless someone recovers them from S3-Link Recycle Bin.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: S3-Files moved in S3-Link Recycle Bin will be available for recovery for these many days. After these many days S3-Files will be auto deleted from Salesforce and Amazon S3 unless someone recovers them from S3-Link Recycle Bin.
CustomField.label: Number of Days for Recycle Bin
